body_html:
after Upgrading to TensorFlow 1.6, I have this issue too. Programs which worked before stopped with
"fish: 'python3 <scriptname.py>' terminated by signal SIGILL (Illegale Instruktion)"
test.py has just a single line, in which it imports tensorflow library.

body:
after Upgrading to TensorFlow 1.6, I have this issue too. Programs which worked before stopped with
"fish: 'python3 <scriptname.py>' terminated by signal SIGILL (Illegale Instruktion)"
test.py has just a single line, in which it imports tensorflow library.
